---
title: "Safe Global contracts"
description: Multi-signatures vaults on Arthera
---

Several projects need a Safe contract to operate, this is the official Safe info on Arthera Mainnet:

- contracts addresses for version **[1.4.1](https://github.com/safe-global/safe-deployments/pull/395/files)**
- contracts addresses for version **[1.3.0](https://github.com/safe-global/safe-deployments/pull/394/files)**

You can view the Safe contracts source code on [GitHub](https://github.com/safe-global/safe-smart-account/tree/main/contracts).

:::info

_Latest update: December 4, 2024_

:::
